snippet: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored in regulation and had the only goal in the shootout to lift the Capitals to a 4-3 win over the New York Islanders on Saturday and keep Washington's playoff hopes alive....

headline.print_headline: Kuznetsov's SO Goal Lifts Capitals Over Isles 4-3
headline.main: Kuznetsov's SO Goal Lifts Capitals Over Isles 4-3

lead_paragraph: Evgeny Kuznetsov scored in regulation and had the only goal in the shootout to lift the Capitals to a 4-3 win over the New York Islanders on Saturday and keep Washington's playoff hopes alive.
